1.16.5.1.16.5-1.0.4.0:
Made compatible with most modded containers, by using Mixins instead of Forge events
Fixed offhand slot being rendered in the creative inventory, even if disabled
Removed the "defaultTooltipGUIs" config option, as it should not be needed anymore
Added client-side "hideOffhand" config option, allowing the player to hide the offhand slot from the inventory without disabling its functionality
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.0.3.1: Added support for GUIs that are using the Mantle's MultiModuleScreen
